benchmark_details.name: SuperCLUE-Math6 (SC-Math6)
benchmark_details.overview: SC-Math6 is a new benchmark dataset to evaluate the mathematical reasoning abilities of Chinese language models. It consists of over 2000 mathematical word problems requiring multi-step reasoning and provides natural language solutions.
benchmark_details.data_type: mathematical word problems with natural language solutions

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive benchmark for assessing the mathematical reasoning abilities of Chinese language models.

data.source: Curated from elementary school exams and books, manually altered for uniqueness.
data.annotation: Manually verified by annotators who solved the problems.

methods: Evaluation on 13 representative Chinese models using comprehensive scoring scheme.
methodology.calculation: Scores are calculated based on performance across different reasoning steps and overall accuracy.
methodology.interpretation: Scores determine the reasoning level from 1 to 5, based on a comprehensive score.
methodology.baseline_results: Top models like GPT-4 showed superior performance with comprehensive scores ranging from 90.71 to 84.24.
methodology.validation: Manual verification of problems and random sampling checks for quality control.
